pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graph Matching Library for R // This is a wrapper package for the graph matching library 'graphm'. The original 'graphm' C/C++ library can be found in http://cbio.mines-paristech.fr/graphm/ . Latest version ( 0.52 ) of this library is slightly modified to fit 'Rcpp' usage and included in the source package. The development version of the package is also available at https://github.com/adalisan/RGraphM .
